title: senthAmarai pAdhanE
sahitya:
sentAmaraip pAdanE guhanE (tiruc)

cendUr uRai kandanE shanmuganE

anupallavi  

indrAdi dEvarmuni pungavarun tozhum

shAnta swarUpa mukundan maruganE  

caraNam  

paNpADiDum bhaktar uLmanam urugiDa

paN pADume cittam teLivurumE

inbam tadumbi lahari enavE tigazhndu

anbar idayam enum Alayam tanil amarnda
